Posts.EditableText: I would like some suggestions. I need quite a few.
Posts.HTML: I would like some suggestions. I need quite a few.

Posts.EditableText:
Thinking of a space based game???
You got my interest!!!
Standard for uninhabited worlds is
StarName Number
IE: Sol 3 (Earth)

Here are a few pointers:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Planets_in_science_fiction       Several links to other articles...   
http://www.scifiideas.com/planet-generator/     This one generates a random name with planet details...
